message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. I think you'll really love it. Would you like to purchase it for $15000?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8000. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of a price that reflects its true value. Would you be willing to meet me at $12000?
I'm still interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $9000. Can you meet me at that price?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. Would you be willing to consider $14000?
I'm starting to think I can find a better deal elsewhere. I'm willing to meet you at $10500. Can you accept that price?

I understand you're looking for a deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. Would you be willing to meet me at $13000?
